competencies.name: Software Development
competencies.description: Design, creation, testing and documentation of new and amended software components and systems.

competencies.name: Data Analysis
competencies.description: The investigation, evaluation, interpretation and classification of data to create actionable insights.

competencies.name: UI/UX Design
competencies.description: The design of user interfaces and experiences for digital products and services.

competencies.name: Project Management
competencies.description: The planning, monitoring and control of projects.

competencies.name: Information Security
competencies.description: The protection of information systems from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, disruption, modification, or destruction.

competencies.name: Database Design
competencies.description: The specification, design and maintenance of database structures and data models.

competencies.name: Testing
competencies.description: The planning, design, and execution of tests to determine whether systems and software work according to specifications.

competencies.name: DevOps
competencies.description: The integration of development and operations through practices, tools, and culture.

competencies.name: Problem Management
competencies.description: The identification, resolution, and prevention of incidents and problems.

competencies.name: Network Infrastructure
competencies.description: The design, implementation, and management of network infrastructure components and systems.

competencies.name: Business Analysis
competencies.description: The investigation, analysis, review and documentation of business processes and requirements.

competencies.name: Communication Skills
competencies.description: Effectively conveying information to team members and stakeholders.

competencies.name: Machine Learning
competencies.description: Development of algorithms and systems that can learn from and make decisions based on data.

competencies.name: Cloud Services
competencies.description: The configuration, deployment, and management of cloud-based services and infrastructure.

competencies.name: Mobile Development
competencies.description: The development of applications for mobile devices.
